events.name: 5th Annual Total Life Expo
events.description:
FREE to attend! Don't miss the region's most comprehensive health and wellness fair! The Expo includes free health screenings, dozens of vendors, Red Cross blood drive, a farmer's market with food and artisan goods for sale, free children's activities, and much more. 

Details at www.TotalLifeExpo.com. 

Supported by Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield and Optum. Hosted by The Chamber of Commerce of Eastern Connecticut and The Mohegan Tribe.

events.name: New England Food Truck Festival
events.description:
The New England Food Truck Festival features dozens of food trucks, live music, entertainment for kids, face painting, field games and much more.

TICKETS
Single-day admission: $5
2-day admission: $8
Kids 6 years & younger: FREE

Tickets can be purchased through Mohegan Sun Box Office & Ticketmaster

Please note: Ticket prices do not include cost of food and beverages at each truck.

events.name: Sirius XM Presents I Love The 90's - The Party Continues
events.description:
As the highly successful, best-selling I Love the 90's Tour continues selling out arenas across America, the party is set to roll again this summer with an all-new lineup of the 90's greatest hit-makers. TLC will take the reins on a nostalgia-driven blast from the past joined by a stellar cast of 90's hit makers including Montell Jordan, Color Me Badd, Biz Markie, Coolio and C+C Music Factory with Freedom Williams, for promises to be a night full of nostalgic hits doubling as an arena sized dance party!

Sale Dates and Times:

Public Onsale : Fri, 14 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

Ticketmaster Presale : Wed, 12 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

VIP Package Presale : Wed, 12 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

VIP Package Public Onsale : Fri, 14 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

Venue Presale : Wed, 12 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

Radio Presale : Wed, 12 Apr 2017 at 10:00 AM

Mother's Day Promotion : Fri, 21 Apr 2017 at 07:00 AM

events.name: Beatlemania Now at Party on the Rooftop
events.description:
Fridays, June 30th - September 1st
Thursday, August 10th
7:00pm - 11:00pm
Riverview Garage Rooftop


THE WEEKEND STARTS WITH A ROOFTOP BASH! LIVE MUSIC, NO COVER!

The Friday hotspot for the 21-and-over crowd is the Riverview Garage Rooftop. All summer long, we're partying with drink specials, fire pits, table games, slot machines, cornhole games and your favorite tunes by amazing tribute bands.

Specialty Cocktails | Wine | $3 Bud Light Drafts

Reserve a fire pit, VIP parking and your first round of drinks for six. Call 860.861.0744 for availability and pricing.

This event is a part of Free and Fun Fridays.

EXTRA NIGHT! Thursday, August 10th | 7:00pm - 11:00pm
Get the party started before the Kenny Chesney concert with Country Legends!

Band Schedule
Terrapin (Grateful Dead) - June 30th
Parrot Beach (Jimmy Buffett) - August 4th
Bon Jersey (Bon Jovi) - July 7th	
Country Legends (Garth Brooks, Keith Urban, Zac Brown Band) - August 11th
Tim McGraw Tribute featuring: Adam D. Tucker (Tim McGraw) - July 14th	
UV (U2) - August 18th
Dave Matthews Band Tribute (DMB) - July 21st	
Tramps Like Us (Bruce Springsteen)  - August 25th
Pirate Flag (Kenny Chesney) - July 28th	
Beatlemania (The Beatles) - September 1st

Please Note

Seating is available on a first-come, first-served basis. However, feel free to bring your own chairs! Guests are not permitted to bring coolers or outside food/beverages. Bands subject to change.

All guests must be 21 or older and have a valid ID.

venue.name: Mohegan Sun
venue.about: Mohegan Sun is one of the largest, most spectacular entertainment, gaming, dining and shopping destinations in the United States.

events.name: Tim Cote and Anthony Edly at Bean and Vine Terrace
events.description:
Get a taste of the Terrace at the all-new Bean and Vine Café & Wine Bar this summer. Located in the Earth Tower lobby, the Bean and Vine Terrace will satiate your appetite serving small plates. Enjoy live music from 6:00pm-9:00pm every Thursday this summer during Hot Summer Fun. 
 
Full schedule: http://bit.ly/2sKv5OV

venue.name: Mohegan Sun
venue.about: Mohegan Sun is one of the largest, most spectacular entertainment, gaming, dining and shopping destinations in the United States.

events.name: Mohegan Sun's Winning Authors Presents Elin Hilderbrand, Author
events.description:
New York Times bestselling author Elin Hilderbrand is at her "page-turning best" with her new release and she’s ready to share it with fans at Mohegan Sun during an exclusive Winning Authors event on Sunday, August 27th. Join Elin for a free live Q&A followed by an autograph signing of her new book The Identicals, a must-read for the summer season.

2:00pm: Live Discussion
3:00pm: Book Signing Event

Pre-order Book here: http://bit.ly/2sfkj0d


More info: http://bit.ly/2sYFPGx

Please Note

*Participation is on a first-come, first-served basis.
